channel.title: Mystery Island
channel.desc: Contest winners try to solve a fake murder for a grand prize, but the event goes awry when a real murder occurs and secrets are uncovered. Cozy crime thriller.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Pumpkin Everything
channel.desc: An up-and-coming novelist must confront an old flame from her past when she returns to her hometown to look after her stubborn grandfather and his pumpkin-themed store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hearts Under The Olive Tree
channel.desc: When an author can't find inspiration for her next fantasy book, her mother takes her to a farmland retreat to get her creative juices flowing and finds something even more magical.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Destination Love
channel.desc: When Madison travels to New Zealand to plan her best friend's wedding, she finds the perfect location, but loses her heart to the idyllic vineyard's owner.
